author: USA TODAY, From USA TODAY Network and wire reports, USA TODAY
title: Park closures, 3D-printed masks, writing history: News from around our 50 states
description: How the COVID-19 pandemic is affecting every state
content:
Alabama
Layne Bjornseth, left, and her boyfriend, Ben Glover, touch up a mural with chalk off Southampton Court on Monday in Decatur, Ala. Bjornseths inspiration for the artwork is to share a message of hope and encouragement during the coronavirus pandemic.… [+51927 chars]
